innovation.title: Effcient
innovation.content: Opening and closing position costs as much as an AMM token swap.

innovation.title: Transparency
innovation.content: No backend service. No permissoned roles. Everyone have the same right.

innovation.title: High Resistance
innovation.content: Price feed are protected against manipulations and flashloan.

innovation.title: Zero Trading Fee
innovation.content: Open and Close position cost nothing as Fee and Interest are charged over time.

innovation.title: Real Yield
innovation.content: Real service brings real profit. Pool reserve, fee and interest are paid from trader to LP and protocol using time-proven token reserve (ETH, BTC, etc.)

innovation.title: No Liquidation
innovation.content: Derivative positions (long/short) are power perpetual fungible token, which has compound leverage that never be liquidated. (ETH^x or ETH^-x value can never go negative).

innovation.title: Infinite Liquidity
innovation.content: Counter-party risks miltigated: LP is less exposed to the market volatility. Liquidity can never be exhausted.

about.heading: Derivable was born out of a shared vision among a group of passionate individuals who recognized the challenges faced by perpetual and futures exchanges.
about.explain: Fueled by a desire to revolutionize the leveraged derivatives market, we embarked on a mission to introduce a novel approach. Leveraging the power of blockchain technology, we created an innovative AMM that eliminates the risks of liquidation and under-collateralization.

vision.text-1: We envision a future of leveraged derivatives market that open to any token by the community. We believe in the democratization of access and opportunities, allowing individuals from all walks of life to actively engage in decentralized trading.
vision.text-2: As part of our vision, we are committed to building an academic community that fosters knowledge sharing, collaboration, and innovative ideas in the leveraged derivatives space.

mission.text-1: At Derivable Labs, our mission is to create a fair, transparent, and community-driven leveraged derivatives market. We are dedicated to building innovative tools, seamless trading experiences, and robust risk management solutions. We strive to empower our community members with the knowledge and resources they need to navigate the world of leveraged derivatives confidently.
mission.text-2: Through our platform and academic community, we aim to cultivate a collaborative environment where experts, researchers, and enthusiasts can come together to shape the future of leveraged trading.
